data.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
data.overview: The tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into Jumanji's world - pitted against rhinos, black mambas and an endless variety of jungle traps and puzzles. To survive, they'll play as characters from the game.

data.title: The Greatest Showman
data.overview: The story of American showman P.T. Barnum, founder of the circus that became the famous traveling Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus.

data.title: Iron Man 3
data.tagline: Unleash the power behind the armor.
data.overview: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

data.title: Wonder Woman
data.overview: An Amazon princess comes to the world of Man in the grips of the First World War to confront the forces of evil and bring an end to human conflict.

data.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
data.tagline: Reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
data.overview: When an attack on the Kingsman headquarters takes place and a new villain rises, Eggsy and Merlin are forced to work together with the American agency known as the Statesman to save the world.

data.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
data.overview: Captain Jack Sparrow works his way out of a blood debt with the ghostly Davey Jones, he also attempts to avoid eternal damnation.
